title: Atchivements of Barons
artist: Edward Davis, Abraham Blooteling, Robert White
description: This plate comes from the book A display of heraldry manifesting a more easie access to the knowledge thereof than hath been hitherto published by any, through the benefit of method.
There are four crests shown: Phillip Lord Wharton, John Lord Willoughby, William Lord Pagett, Charles Lord North of Cardidge.
